Eggs and. Rice
Good grief.... with all of the young people watching these videos I'd think you'd be more careful about showing how to cut fruit.  Yes, cutting a slash pattern and inverting the skin is the easy way to cut up a mango (Don't cut it off the skin.  You waste mango.  It easily falls of the skin, with your fingers.), BUT do not EVER hold the mango slice in your palm while cutting it.  It's just as easy to hold it on the table with your fingertips, and it is much less likely to accidentally slice your fingers or accidentally cut through the mango and stab your hand, especially if the mango isn't that ripe.  Safety should always be the priority!

Ok Y'all I'm totally not hating, I actually really love her videos. But, you should never, and I repeat, NEVER try to soften up your mascara when it has dried. Bacteria grows more effectively when the brush is dried out, meaning that it is more likely to be infested. I got an infection in my eye about a year ago from using an old mascara. As soon as it starts getting clumpy, THROW IT AWAY IMMEDIATELY. Please do not follow that hack, because it can be very dangerous and possibly even give you an infection.

Thanks for sharing. A life hack for you....the bobby pins stay in your hair better when you put the flat side up and the other side facing your scalp (so you would paint the flat side/that's the side that will show).

Everyday, I have porridge (oatmeal in America! :).   Here's how I make it: (It's probably very similar to everyone, but you know...!) 1. Pour 1/2 cup of oats into a microwave save bowl. 2. Add 1 cup of milk 3. Place in microwave for 1:30 seconds.         QUICK TIP: Leave it to rest in the microwave for 2-3 minutes to prevent it from over flowing and cook it faster, as it cooks in the bowl if it is warm. 4.  Cook in microwave for another minute. 5. You may want to leave it to cool & cook for a while. 6. Take out porridge and stir in 2 tablespoons of honey and 1 tablespoon of cinnamon.  7. Delicious!!! Eat an enjoy!

In this beauty video I used 3 video ideas and combined them in one. You will find a bunch of cool life hacks, DIY projects and my morning routine, which will make your own mornings interesting and unique. I included life hacks and DIYs for hair, healthy breakfast ideas, nail art, snacks, working out and much more. Let me know if you liked this morning routine and if you would like to see a night routine soon :) Love you <3
